Geotab is seeking a Software Developer Intern who will create software that moves toward our goal of making a stable and extensible platform for which other teams and third-party developers can build upon.You will contribute to a mission-critical application that is used by over 450k drivers daily and the role requires a keen eye for detail. The mobile platform team works with a modern tech stack including Typescript, React, and Redux (with an API using technologies such as C#, ASP.NET, Docker, Kubernetes, and PostgreSQL on the backend). Join a team dedicated to modernizing and improving a large scale mobile web application that is used by thousands and thousands of drivers every day to handle their compliance needs (HOS, DVIR, etc.), as well as features like routing and messaging. What you'll do: As a Software Developer Intern, your key area of responsibility will be collaborating with a native app development team to ensure that the web application can use native functionality on a variety of both iOS and Android tablets and phones. Code quality is prioritized through unit, integration and end-to-end testing as well as defensive coding practices to ensure the rapid releases are stable and scalable. This role offers a unique blend of complex technical challenges, opportunities for mentorship, and the expectation to improve our mobile app platform and make it future-ready.
